theSeeker:SuzuriBakoRelic.NAME: Suzuri-bako
theSeeker:SuzuriBakoRelic.FLAVOR: Perhaps the heaviest weights we lift are our feelings
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b10th time you gain #yBlock from a card, gain twice as much #yBlock.

theSeeker:BlackAnvilRelic.NAME: Black Anvil
theSeeker:BlackAnvilRelic.FLAVOR: Perhaps the heaviest weights we lift are our feelings
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card costing #b2 or more, gain [E]].

theSeeker:ThePrinceRelic.NAME: The Prince
theSeeker:ThePrinceRelic.FLAVOR: ...and then, they will always be faithful to him.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose #b2 #yTemporary #yStrength.

theSeeker:ApocryphaRelic.NAME: Apocrypha
theSeeker:ApocryphaRelic.FLAVOR: Not part of the accepted canon.

theSeeker:DialoguesRelic.NAME: Dialogues
theSeeker:DialoguesRelic.FLAVOR: What I do not know, I don't think I do.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add a #yDialogue into your hand.

theSeeker:MeditationsRelic.NAME: Meditations
theSeeker:MeditationsRelic.FLAVOR: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, #yPonder.

theSeeker:TinPeacockRelic.NAME: Tin Peacock
DESCRIPTIONS: When #yImpetuous #yStance repeats an attack, reset its attack counter.

theSeeker:LekythosRelic.NAME: Lekythos
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b2 #yTemporary #yStrength.

theSeeker:BedOfNailsRelic.NAME: Bed Of Nails
theSeeker:BedOfNailsRelic.FLAVOR: Comfort is weakness entering the body.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPreface triggers also for the second card played each turn .

theSeeker:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theSeeker:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theSeeker:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
